document.full_text: bp and russia's rosneft have extended by a month the deadline to complete a $16 billion share swap hours before its expiry, giving bp more time to salvage the deal.
document.title: bp, rosneft extend deadline on $16 billion share swap
lines_and_colors: bp and russia's rosneft have extended by a month the deadline to complete a $16 billion share swap hours before its expiry, giving bp more time to salvage the deal.
